data.name: Gahkthun of the Golden Lightning Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Gahkthun of the Golden Lightning - Original Soundtrack

Features all the game tracks including the full sized opening and ending songs, along with their instrumental versions!


01. Tonitrus (4:37)
02. Daily Life - The Academia's Elegance (2:02)
03. Daily Life - The Academia's Twilight (2:04)
04. Daily Life - The Academia's Waterways (1:50)
05. Exercise - Someone's Memories (1:36)
06. Drops - Someone's Tears (1:57)
07. Heart - Someone's Hope (1:59)
08. The White Man - Speculative Detective Club (1:36)
09. Love - Narrowing His Eyes (2:28)
10. Rule - The Governing Council (3:09)
11. Turning - Tragedy Sneer (1:40)
12. Tension - The Demon's Presence (2:06)
13. Menace - The Demon's March (2:12)
14. Electric Knight - King of Lightning (2:09)
15. The Rose King Laughs (2:39)
16. The Road of Hope, With You (1:47)
17. Radiance (2:09)
18. quaerere (4:45)
19. Tonitrus - Instrumental (4:37)
20. quaerere - Instrumental (4:43)
